about_the_game:
An unknowable authority has decided your fate in the tarot cards.

It's not good news.

Mini-Dead: Tarot is an expansion for Mini-Dead introducing more bosses, more original music, more achievements and more secrets.

Harder

Running at 144fps and with a unique, mouse-only control scheme, it's a longer, faster and harder experience to really test your fortitude.

The Cards Dictate Your Fate

If only this were a normal deck of tarot cards. No. I'm afraid you have the misfortune of being dealt a hand from a darker deck.

The Abandoned Child
The ones you trust the most will deceive you the hardest.

The Sun and the Moon
The heavens find your misery to be nothing more than mild amusement.

The Entertainer
Respect will come to you after an irreversible sacrifice.

The Helping Hand

Fear not. Mini-Dead: Tarot comes with an uplifting hints and tips section courtesy of the Helping Hand! You can visit him if you're ever feeling hopeless and useless and pathetic and miserable and completely worthless to everyone.

Unique Mechanic

Mini-Dead: Tarot features the exact same controls as Mini-Dead. A unique mouse only control scheme, creating a high reflex combat system not seen elsewhere.

The enemy is as fast as you.

content_descriptors.notes: Involves scenes of hanging and general horror.
